posts.post_content:
This card was a shoo-in for flavor reasons, but alas, it still sucks.  
To put this in perspective, you're effectively paying ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) just to exile the top card of your library - and you still have to pay its mana cost if you want to play it. And you're limited to this turn, otherwise it vanishes forever. Looks like Niv-Mizzet put more time into making it look pretty than into making it actually work.
posts.html:
This card was a shoo-in for flavor reasons, but alas, it still sucks.
To put this in perspective, you're effectively paying just to exile the top card of your library - and you still have to pay its mana cost if you want to play it. And you're limited to this turn, otherwise it vanishes forever. Looks like Niv-Mizzet put more time into making it look pretty than into making it actually work.

posts.post_content:
[Svogthos, the Restless Tomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Svogthos, the Restless Tomb) totally outclasses this card by far.   
  
It'd be much more interesting if it was somewhat like [Mikokoro, Center of the Sea](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mikokoro, Center of the Sea), and make you draw a card or so.

It'd be much more interesting if it was somewhat like Mikokoro, Center of the Sea, and make you draw a card or so.

Very situational. Its useful if you have no plays, or are holding counters. Tap + this land to pop your lightning bolt or brainstorm. Need 6 lands and some luck, not unheard of.

@Atemu1234
No, that would be crazy for a control deck. Control likes holding mana anyways, so thats close to a land + a one sided howling mine. :Draw a card, might be okay.
